Reviews.Title: “Expensive, but definitely worth it.”
Reviews.Author: Chris W
Reviews.Content: st marks little expensive comparable weve stayed london terms location money worth apartments located islington favourite london st marks 3 minute walk angel tube station surrounded restaurants little boutique shops bedroom apartment stayed beautiful clean spacious kitchen bathrooms living washing machine dryer front desk manned late night arrived home night welcome imagine late checkins wouldnt apartment complex situated opposite minimart internet cafe especially handy consider arent serviced stayed 7 days service available extra charge id definitely stay id recommend
